msg: Commit patch including mysql support and i18n work, on behalf of Hitoshi Ozawa.

author: veithen
msg: Added some code that allows to construct test cases that use HTTP with port numbers allocated by the OS. That is useful if one wants to run builds concurrently.

msg: HBASE-4970  Add a parameter so that keepAliveTime of Htable thread pool can be changed (gaojinchao)
